content: around next double_crochet *double_crochet in each of next 5 sts 1 bptr around next double_crochet repeat from * across row to last 4 sts double_crochet in last 4 sts row 5 chain 3 double_crochet in next of 4 sts 1 fptr around next bptr *double_crochet in each of next 5 sts 1 fptr around next bptr repeat from * across row to last 4 sts double_crochet in last 4 sts row 6 change to color b chain 3 double_crochet in next of 4 sts 1 bptr around next fptr *double_crochet in each of next 5 sts 1 bptr around next fptr repeat from * across row to last 4 sts double_crochet in last 4 sts row 7 change to color a repeat row 3 row 8 change to color b chain 3 double_crochet in each st across row row 9 chain 1 single_crochet in each st across row fasten_off harley s scarf iii worked sideways with color a chain 61 row 1 work single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in each chain across row 60 sts row 2 chain 3 double_crochet in each st across row 60 sts row 3 rs change to color a chain 1 single_crochet in each st across row row 4 change to color a chain 3 double_crochet in each st across row row 5 chain 1 single_crochet in each st across row fasten_off finishing weave in ends add fringes copyright 2008© lisa gentry 212 spruce drive - chatham la 71226 - www hookandneedledesigns com
